sources.title: A Kick in Time (1940)
sources.description: Spunky is kidnapped and sold at an auction to a cruel Italian peddler. It's up to Hunky to save him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-kick-in-time-1940/

metadata.Plot: Playwright Gaylord Esterbrook scores a hit with his first Broadway play, both with the critics and with leading lady Linda Paige. He and Linda are happily married until a patroness of the arts convinces Esterbrook to forget about comedy and concentrate on writing a tragedy. The end result nearly destroys his career and his marriage.
metadata.Actors: Rosalind Russell, James Stewart, Genevieve Tobin
